payload.cte_query_sql: SELECT ctr_store_sk, AVG(ctr_total_return)*1.2 AS avg_ctr_total_return FROM customer_total_return GROUP BY ctr_store_sk

steps.description: Pre-compute per-store average return amounts to eliminate correlated subquery

payload.expr_sql: ctr1.ctr_total_return > (SELECT sa.avg_ctr_total_return FROM store_averages sa WHERE sa.ctr_store_sk = ctr1.ctr_store_sk) AND ctr1.ctr_reason_sk BETWEEN 43 AND 46 AND s_store_sk = ctr1.ctr_store_sk AND s_state IN ('IL', 'KY', 'TX') AND ctr1.ctr_customer_sk = c_customer_sk AND c_current_cdemo_sk = cd_demo_sk AND cd_marital_status IN ('M', 'M') AND cd_education_status IN ('Advanced Degree', 'College') AND cd_gender = 'F' AND c_birth_month = 2 AND c_birth_year BETWEEN 1965 AND 1971

steps.description: Replace correlated subquery with reference to pre-computed CTE (semantically equivalent)
